about_the_game:
The game features the various activities that characterize life in a village colony on Mars, as well as the dangers you will have to overcome in the form of Artificial Intelligence preventing you from rebuilding the village.

Game Features:


- Unique Setting: Create a unique community where modern technology merges with traditional Russian culture.



- Variety of Activities: Farm, raise livestock and poultry, build structures, fish, gather mushrooms, berries and more. Life in a village won't let you get bored!



- Social Interaction: Every inhabitant has different needs, desires and dreams. Create a society where everyone can find their place.



Russian Village Simulator on Mars combines your fantasies of space and your love of earth into an incredibly detailed and vibrant world. Build your Martian dream village!

Are you ready to take on the challenge and create a new legacy in the most unusual colony on Mars?.

content_descriptors.notes: The ability to consume alcohol is present in the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200 (4 core 3.1 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GIGABYTE GTX 970 4GB or AMD Radeon™ RX 580 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel™ Core i7-3770 or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 2060 or AMD Radeon RX 6600 (8GB VRAM with Shader Model 5.0 or better)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended

short_description: Develop a village colony on Mars, using various resources and bringing the unique flavor of Russian culture to the distant space.
supported_languages:
English, Russian*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Portugal
*languages with full audio support
